**This API is for create events based on given details.**

 **HTTP Status Code Summary**
 | Code | Description |
 | --- | ---- |
 | **200 - OK** | Everything worked as expected. |
  | **400 - Bad Request** | The request was unacceptable, often due to missing a required parameter. |
  | **401 - Unauthorized** | No valid API key provided. |
   | **404 - Not Found** | The requested resource doesn't exist.

body.raw:
{
    "config": {
        "prefix": [
            "Prefix",
            false,
            "/^[a-zA-Z]+$/"
        ],
        "firstName": [
            "First Name",
            false,
            "/^[a-zA-Z]+$/"
        ],
        "middleName": [
            "Middle Name",
            false,
            "/^[a-zA-Z]+$/"
        ],
        "lastName": [
            "Last Name",
            false,
            "/^[a-zA-Z]+$/"
        ],
        
        "addressLine1": [
            "House number",
            false,
            "/^[a-zA-Z]+$/"
        ],
        "addressLine2": [
            "Street",
            false,
            "/^[a-zA-Z]+$/"
        ],
        "addressLine3": [
            "Address Line 3",
            false,
            "/^[a-zA-Z]+$/"
        ],
        "addressLine4": [
            "Address Line 4",
            false,
            "/^[a-zA-Z]+$/"
        ],
        "city": [
            "City",
            false,
            "/^[a-zA-Z]+$/"
        ],
        "state": [
            "State",
            false,
            "/^[a-zA-Z]+$/"
        ],
        "zipCode": [
            "postal Code",
            false,
            "/^[0-9]+$/"
        ],
        "landmark": [
            "Landmark",
            false,
            "/^[a-zA-Z]+$/"
        ],
        "geolocation": [
            "Geo Location",
            false,
            "/^[a-zA-Z]+$/"
        ],
        "template": {
            "input": "{{addressLine1}}{{N}}{{addressLine2}}{{N}}{{city}}{{state}}{{N}}{{country}}",
            "display": "{{addressLine1}}{{N}}{{addressLine2}}{{N}}{{city}}{{state}}{{N}}{{zipCode}}{{N}}{{country}}"
        }
    }
}

request.description:
| **Possible States** |
| ------ |
| `onboarding:onboarding` |
| `active:active` |
| `active:pause` |
| `active:deboard` |
| `inactive:inactive` |
| `inactive:terminal` |

item.name: Update state of Facility by id or external ref

request.description:
**State Transitions Allowed**

| from_state | -> | to_state |
| ------ | ------|------|
|`onboarding:onboarding`| **->** | `active:active` |
|`active:active`| **->** | `inactive:inactive` `active:deboard` `active:pause` |
|`active:pause`| **->** | `active:active` |
|`active:deboard`| **->** | `active:active` `inactive:inactive` |
|`inactive:inactive`| **->** | `active:active` |
|`inactive:terminal`| **->** |  |

item.name: Get current state of User by id or external ref

request.description:
| **Possible States** |
| ------ |
| `onboarding:onboarding` |
| `active:available` |
| `active:busy` |
| `active:unavailable` |
| `active:allocated` |
| `active:deboarding` |
| `inactive:inactive` |
| `inactive:terminal` |

item.name: Update state of User by id or external ref

request.description:
**State Transitions Allowed**

| from_state | -> | to_state |
| ------ | ------|------|
|`onboarding:onboarding`| **->** | `active:available` |
|`active:available`| **->** | `active:busy` `active:unavailable` `inactive:inactive` `active:allocated` `active:deboarding` |
|`active:busy`| **->** | `active:available` |
|`active:unavailable`| **->** | `active:available` `inactive:inactive` |
|`active:allocated`| **->** | `active:available` |
|`active:deboarding`| **->** | `inactive:inactive` |
|`inactive:inactive`| **->** | `active:available` |
|`inactive:terminal`| **->** |  |

|`active:unavailable`| **->** | `active:available` `inactive:inactive` |
|`inactive:inactive`| **->** | `active:available` |
|`inactive:terminal`| **->** |  |
